oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Circular to the members of the General Assembly
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Governor John Sevier's address to the Tennessee General Assembly as transcribed by Daniel Smith. Sevier debriefs members about the outcome of Tennessee's appeal for admission. At this time, he also summons the members to attend the first session of the General Assembly.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smith, Daniel, 1748-1818
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Smith, Daniel, 1748-1818; Tennessee. General Assembly; Tennessee -- Politics and government -- To 1865; North Carolina -- Politics and government -- 1775-1865
Politics & government
